title: Your Leaks hahaha
content:
Welcome to a markdown rendered page from NetlifyCMS!

We can do formatting like **Bold** and *Italics*, we can make lists:

* With bullet points

1. Or numbers

and much more. 

Just note, because tailwind.css overwrites all the default element styles, you'll need to add css to render these properly, check the css/tailwind.css file for more.

 The data files are stored as JSON so that we get type inference for free with typescript.

services.title: Awarded Electrician
services.description: Divide details about your product or agency work into parts. A paragraph describing a feature will be enough.

services.title: Free Water
services.description: Keep you user engaged by providing meaningful information. Remember that by this time, the user is curious.
Write a few lines about each one. A paragraph describing a feature will be enough. Keep you user engaged
services.title: Verified Company

featured.title: Top Notch Services
featured.description: The Arctic Ocean freezes every winter and much of the sea-ice then thaws every summer, and that process will continue whatever happens.

serviceBlock.content:
### Working with us is a pleasure

Don't let your uses guess by attaching tooltips and popoves to any element. Just make sure you enable them first via JavaScript.

The kit comes with three pre-built pages to help you get started faster. You can change the text and images and you're good to go. Just make sure you enable them first via JavaScript.

[Check Tailwind Starter Kit!](http://localhost:3000/#)

slogan: This is a simple example of a Landing Page Ben

buildBlock.title: Build Something
buildBlock.description: Put the potentially record low maximum sea ice extent tihs year down to low ice. According to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, Ted, Scambos.
